headline.main: Russia's Biggest Steelmaker NLMK Can Withstand Anti-Dumping Duties
headline.print_headline: Russia's Biggest Steelmaker NLMK Can Withstand Anti-Dumping Duties

lead_paragraph: Russia's largest steelmaker NLMK is well-placed to weather the impact of European Union and U.S. anti-dumping duties and may expand into new markets such as Turkey and Asia to secure greater profits, it said on Monday.
snippet: Russia's largest steelmaker NLMK is well-placed to weather the impact of European Union and U.S. anti-dumping duties and may expand into new markets such as Turkey and Asia to secure greater profits, it said on Monday....
